Battera::

She saw Windlord take to the air. She had heard Kup groan. "You need 
help. But..." she looked skyward. "I feel obligated to help your 
friend for some reason. I have to follow my programing. Please, get 
some rest."  And with that, she unfolded her winds, transformed into 
her huge bat form, and took to the sky after Windlord. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He takes his first step toward the opening when he hears 
Condor's cry 
> for help.  He stops and looks back finally locating his dying 
comrade.  He 
> surveys the damage before receiving the orders to pursue Flicker.  
He growls 
> incomprehensibly coming to the realization that there is nothing 
more he can 
> do he turns and takes to the air after Flicker.
